website_summaries.verdict: This adorable monkey-themed game teaches several basic math concepts in a fun and engaging manner. Challenge cards, a scale, weighted numbers, and several mini monkey figures give kids a clear visual of one-to-one correspondence.
pros: Teaches a host of basic math skills, including number recognition, counting, addition, and subtraction
Three progressive levels keep kids interested and learning
Suitable for both solitary and group play
Easy to set up and use
cons: The challenge cards are somewhat thin and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: I really love the idea of this gift. It was a gift for my 3 year old daughter and she loves it. However, the numbers are not all accurate. The 6 doesn’t balance with 6 monkeys, etc. this happens with quite a few of the numbers. The whole point of the toy is the equal balancing and it is teaching my daughter to add more monkeys than the number to get it to balance! Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy and it’s fun!
customer_reviews.text: I went back in forth several times on wether I should get this or not. I finally ordered them and so glad I did! I should have ordered them a while ago. My 5 1/2 year old and 2 year old both love it and it is a great learning toy. The numbers are weighted.. So For example if you put a number 4 on one side of the scale and then 4 monkeys on the other side they will weigh the same. It really is great!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Math Toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my preschool class. The kids really enjoy it and there are so many ways to play with it. When teaching it is important to have things that can apply to many different learning abilities and styles. This game allows children to learn no matter where they are at with their early math skills. Fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Apple Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent math game
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this game. I got it for my 5 year old, but even my 11, 9, and 2 year olds love playing with it. The quality of each piece is made very well. I love the make of the monkeys and the numbers. It was a really well thought out game. My 5 year old will sit and play with it on his own coming up with new number combinations. It’s really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: wonderful game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old granddaughter. She LOVES it! It is an awesome tool to learn math skills and have fun doing it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, enjoyable, easy way to learn math skills
customer_reviews.text: It is great item to improve kids mathematic skills. There are 30 cards to play with them or you can prepare addition and subtraction problems. It is good for kids who pre-k to 3 grade. Maybe more because you can hide a number with these cards and kids can find the hidden number under the card. But don’t neglect the weight the card that you put on it. We’re playing like that. I bought it 5 more to give a gift for my friends kids.
customer_reviews.author: VOLKAN CAGLAR

customer_reviews.title: Great educational toy!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is very cool! The numbers are weighted so you can balance them to the correct number of monkeys on the other side. It also comes with flashcards that give math problems to practice with. My 4 year old got this for his birthday but my 6 and 8 year old are loving it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i expected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy has good quality. Everything is very colorful and the paint finishes are excellent. The box is also very cute. First I had bought a cheaper one from another seller but I returned it because I disappointed, instead this one is spectacular !!
customer_reviews.author: Diego Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE : Customer service is fantastic and I am very happy with the resolution we came to. My 4 year old loves this game and I can already see an improvement in his math skills! My 4 year old was super excited to play this game, unfortunately, it didn't come with the cards! He's very disappointed. We're not happy with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Play & learning!
customer_reviews.text: Love this educational game! My son loves counting & weighing the monkeys. It has 4 levels of learning. The easier levels he can play by himself. Independent play-bonus! Good quality. Make sure you level the scale first before play. There is a little circle right in the middle you adjust to level scale. I used a coin to help me turn it so it was in the middle. Don’t worry this is not complicated! Little monkeys are so cute too. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A Great Learning Experience
customer_reviews.text: This Toy-Math game is so great. It provides hands on understanding of addition and subtraction. The little monkeys make for a fun start, the weighted numbers equals the equivalent number of monkeys. This "Toy" helps children understand numbers and quantity. This toy is a very useful and fun way to begin understanding of numbers and math. The quality of this teaching toy is good. It is fun for both the parent and child. You must supervise your Childs play, the monkeys could be a choking hazard, but again this is a Learning Toy. I would highly recommend this for teaching numbers and their equivalents, it makes it fun to learn.
customer_reviews.author: David Jahns

customer_reviews.title: TEACHERS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ATTENTION TEACHERS!!! PRE-K(VPK)- 3RD GRADE!!!!! I love this game. I bought this for my autistic on (4 legal 2.75 adjusted) to help him recognize numbers. I put a three on the scale and three monkeys and it balanced out then i added a number 4 to the 3. it took 7 monkeys to balance it out. my son LOVES this game he is now counting out load the monkeys and identifying the numbers!! I love that it can continue to grow with him with addition and subtraction. from years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute educational
customer_reviews.text: My 3 + 10 months grandson loved this toy, he really got into the balancing of objects. He put a rock and used the weights, then he used the monkeys instead to see how many monkeys would balance the rock. Then he got his monster mini trucks and weighed them against each other. It was a hit. Only thing monkeys are on the smaller side, keep away from younger babies, chocking hazard. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Elvia Bender

customer_reviews.title: So fun kids don't realize they're learning!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for each set of my 2-4 year old grandchildren. They all love playing with it, and their moms love that the kids are learning in the process. My one daughter-in-law commented that she had been struggling to get her just turned 3-year-old to practice his numbers, saying he is resistant to any 'teaching' activities, but he loved playing the monkey balance game, so she was able to 'sneak' teaching him. WIN! WIN!
customer_reviews.author: R. Knoll

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful for a range of skills!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 3 year old who enjoys counting and putting the number of monkeys on the scale to balance with the weighted number. It works great! It's also a nice introduction to math and weights. Eventually we plan to do the math (addition and subtraction) as shown on the cards provided. We also love to play "10 little monkeys" while singing the song with it (another good counting game).
customer_reviews.author: Keen211

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, wish it was actually ballanced
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome idea, but if it doesn't balance properly what's the point.? We will probably add a little weight to the side that's always higher, but I expected it to be a bit better than it is. (update) I was contacted by CoolToys and they send a replacement. The new one balances fine and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gambucci

customer_reviews.title: Wow, brilliant toy.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a two-year-old we know. Who immediately proceeded to play with it for HOURS ON END, and to give each little monkey a name (even though they're all identical). In short, cute accessible, clearly fun, and safe. Parents loved the math dimension—the weights and monkeys do in fact work as expected and a better intuitive learning toy there could not be. Everyone, in short, was very excited, nay delighted, as were we as the gift-givers. Win all around!
customer_reviews.author: PRNLM

customer_reviews.title: Not all accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very cute math toy. Unfortunately the #6 was not correctly weighted. Everything else worked fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Helps learn math concepts visual & tactile
customer_reviews.text: First package was missing pieces. Quick exchange and kids love the monkey scale. Great tool for visual and tactile learning! Recommended to me from a ABA company. Would be a 5 star if original was fully intact.
customer_reviews.author: VS2

customer_reviews.title: Educational AND fun!
customer_reviews.text: What a great game for my daughter (almost 4)! I love that it teaches number recognition, counting, math, and physics (weights & balance), while at the same time she is greatly entertained by the process of balancing the scale. The pieces are sturdy and really cute to play with as well. So glad I made this purchase, and she will be able to play/learn with it for several years!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine V.

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this toy and it’s great for learning numbers. The card set included is quite insufficient. Many more math equation combinations are needed and the biggest problem is that the cards have different problems on each side- kids are used to each side of a card relating to each other. Could use improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mule

customer_reviews.title: Cute, works, but cheaply made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and it balances well. Our son really likes it. It is very flimsy for the price though. Both the plastic and the cards are really not sturdy at all. My cards also look like they were picked up or moved before the print was finished drying. They are smudged and scratched up. If you are thinking about purchasing this. I would suggest playing with it on the floor and laminating the cards. If it falls off of a table or gets dropped when a child is packing it around, it won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Monkey math
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use this yet, but I bought this for my grandchildren to use at my house. I have a 5yr old granddaughter with Down Syndrome entering Kindergarten this year and I thought this would be a fun way for her and my 2 grandsons, both of which are in preschool, to learn the basics of counting to 10. This will be great for adding and subtracting the basic numbers also. I am a "down on the floor" grandma who is always looking for the next great learning tool that doesn't include electronics.
customer_reviews.author: KLoh

customer_reviews.title: Missing needed items.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my toddler, almost 2. We just opened it today. Sadly, it is missing the number one, three, and ten as well as the plates that go on the scale to hold the numbers/monkeys. I can only assume it has all the cards but have no way to verify. It’s such a great idea and my son loves the little monkeys, so I gave it two stars. But we can’t use it for its purpose due to missing items. I’m bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Good idea made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: Really great idea and could be really awesome for kids just designed really cheaply. Cheap plastic, ink on design is already scuffed in packaging. Spend the extra money to make it nice.
customer_reviews.author: Crashlynindy

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES this toy
customer_reviews.text: MY son has ADHD and doesn't play with many toys that aren't electronic. In an effort to get him to learn and play at the same time I purchased this toy. its PERFECT. Hes learning counting and balancing and adding and it keeps his attention for around 8-10 minutes which is huge for us!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to help learn numbers!
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LOVE this product! With keeping my daughter home from preschool this year I needed something that would be fun and rewarding for her to help her learn her numbers. She is always excited when I get this game out for her to play. I plan on gifting this to some friends with kids my daughters age as I think this is really beneficial. *I also wanted to clarify as I had seen some complaints that their numbers didn't match the weight of the monkeys. All of mine matched. It does say in the instructions that it may not be completely level but mine has.*
customer_reviews.author: Amazonpleasehidetheboxes

customer_reviews.title: Versatile! And fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got the four year old off the electronics! She's on her way to kindergarten this coming year, and this hands-on math game is just what she needs. This is awesome! Oh... And it's also apparently really fun to make it rain monkeys. Who knew?!?!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift for kids. From counting to simple math, it’s a great learning tool. It seems to be balanced appropriately. The only thing I’d say is I wish the numbers stood up. Some stand, some won’t so they have to be laid flat on the balance plate. Not a big deal, but it’s easier to have a visual when the numbers are standing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition :)
customer_reviews.text: Using this to reinforce early math skills with my 3 year old. We love counting and quantifying with these cute little monkeys. He loves to balance the monkeys with matching number. Also loves matching the right number of monkeys up with the cards that accompany the set. Great addition to our home classroom.
customer_reviews.author: M@m@

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent scale
customer_reviews.text: The idea and concept is great but the scale is inconsistent not balancing properly, monkeys 🐵 are heavier than numbers, for example you place 3 monkeys on left scale and place number 3 on right scale, monkeys are heavier even if you adjust the middle knob. Quality is ok but because monkeys are very small needs adult supervision for younger kids so as not to put inside their mouths.
customer_reviews.author: Marylou B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment - never worked
customer_reviews.text: This broke in 4 minutes. The pin that holds it all together (yes ... A small plastic piece, pushed into a thin metal pin) wasn't installed correctly. My gentle child tried to use it appropriately and it never worked. (4 monkeys did not equal number 4) We tried to adjust the pin. The pin came out and won't be put back in correctly. Such a disappointment. The positive? It's adorable and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: great learning tool for home or in the classroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a great math product for my 4 year old. He loves playing this "game" and is learning so much from it. I like how there are two sides to the cards so it can be used for two different levels of learning. I really like the texture of the little monkeys used for the balance. The balance itself could be a little sturdier. Sometimes when balancing the bigger numbers it does tip. Also, the number cards are a little flimsy as well. But overall, this is a great product and I would highly recommend for parents or for use in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Kids like scale but not game
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Little kids like just playing with scale. Up to age 4 my kids didnt understand or were t interested in the game itself. Not sturdy. Will be Broken Or Parts lost in a Short Time
customer_reviews.author: Cm

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this learning toy
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how this learning toy was made. It seems so far to be standing up to a 3 yr old, and on top of that he likes it. It has multiple ways of learning and the scale actually balances between the monkeys and the numbers. I would be careful with a child that everything goes in their mouths since the monkeys are kinda small. Not tiny but could cause a issue if not paying attention.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, great to teach different concepts
customer_reviews.text: Loved how each number weighed differently so you would put monkeys on the other side of the scale and won’t be equal until the correct number is placed, I lives this feature
customer_reviews.author: loulou77

customer_reviews.title: Great math game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for my five year old grandson to help him with math and he loves playing it. The monkeys are cute and the numbers are colorful. My grandson is starting to understand how the numbers and balance of monkeys(or number of monkeys) equal each other. Great purchase and I highly recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 4 year old and above
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a four year old girl and she spent over an hour exploring all the ways she could balance the scales. In addition to using this toy with the numbers and monkey figures on each side (which is teaching early math as well as numbers) she was balancing other small toys to see what would happen. Really interesting and intellectually stimulating toy! Really glad I bought it. Also, we chose the monkey which turned out to be even cuter than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Workman

customer_reviews.title: Fun for both the kid and the adults!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boyfriend's son as a 5th Birthday gift. He is an only child who loves to play with numbers. What I like most about this toy is that he doesn't need another person to play with him but the adults enjoy it too so either way he's having fun. Numbers are sturdy and weighted accordingly so adding them up on the scale and either using the number that is the sum (1 + 2 on left = 3 on right) or just balancing them with the monkeys is very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome educational toy
customer_reviews.text: I am always looking for good educational toys and this one is a hit. My four year old loves it and there’s several ways to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria E.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love love it. My 3 years old son loves it, there are lots of ways to use it
customer_reviews.author: rama

customer_reviews.title: Used to Teach Balancing Equations to Teens
customer_reviews.text: I teach Algebra to teenagers. They loved seeing visual examples along with the written examples for balancing equations. The point was well made and the students understood the concept. PROS: - Easy to see from a distance - Balance has adjustable trim - Well made
customer_reviews.author: Electronicbuff

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I like that the monkeys have a weight in them so my granddaughter can count Dan when the scale starts to move she stops and them if it needs one more she puts it on. I am hoping she will soon learn her numbers with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lea Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Needs to match colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors dont match the box nor do they match the instructions. It shows three leaning colors but i didn't get that. They did contact me though and sent me another one, but it looked exactly the same. Customer service is great. Other then color issues the product works
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as gift for my granddaughter who just turned 2 and is learning to count. She likes counting the monkeys to match the numbers and see if they weigh the same. She is a little young for it and only plays with it when mom or dad are working with her. Looks to be a good toy for her to learn and grow with.
customer_reviews.author: Louski

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great toy.he monkeys don’t always stand up but I don’t think that should be a big deal. It is light weight and includes additional monkeys. It think it’s a great buy.it works as stated. The cards they come with are thin though and will need to be laminated for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Zia Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy! I enjoy that it’s helps build number concept by only allowing children to balance the quantities that matches the number. My 2 and a half year old enjoys it and it’s a great number recognition game for little ones. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and it was missing the middle piece... I didn’t think it would matter but it does the scale won’t sit evenly and when you put the trays on the tilt to the side. Cute concept and my boys were excited about this but this product was poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: A fun educational, engaging toy be good for child and parent.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my little niece. She totally loved it and her mom said it was going to be a great teaching tool. It was opened and played with immediately. At this time when going back to school (or in her case -- starting) this educational toy/tool is going to help her parents too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter with special needs. She struggles to recognize numbers and count. This is such a great game for her and it grows with her because it has math problems on the other side! She’s 4 now but this could work up to 4th grade! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jinger Tylee Ertel

customer_reviews.title: Kye approved
customer_reviews.text: Despite this not really being sturdy for my 2 year old grandson he loves it. I hand him a card with a number on it and he counts out the monkeys and places them on the other side of the balance plate. If correct the monkeys arms balance. Makes recognizing numbers and counting fun.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so original! My 3 year old plays with it to match numbers and grasp the concept of what they mean.. I can see it’s the kind of product that will grow with her for many years as she learns to Add and subtract. We aren’t utilizing this toy to it’s full potential just yet. I’m very happy with the purchase and will buy more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste B. Fatheree

customer_reviews.title: Used, scratched dirty and sticky pieces
customer_reviews.text: My kids are so excited to play with the game but the numbers are dirty and scratched. The monkeys and the scale trays are sticky. I washed the monkeys in soapy water 3 times and they are still sticky!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J

customer_reviews.title: We Like It!!
customer_reviews.text: Great learning tool for children. Only set back was that all of the numbers didn’t stand up properly (as shown on the picture promotion). The colors on the cards grouped with the instructions were a bit confusing but we figured it out We even created our own game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best kids game!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy! I use it with my students and they have a ball. It’s engaging, fun and instructional. It took me a few tries to calibrate the scale but my students love discovering equal amounts and adding numbers. I also like how they are able to explain how to determine if something is more/less or equal by using this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Markisha M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Learning fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for learning .it made it fun to learn , we only used the easy part the of cards but when we learn math the adding will be used!
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Game for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is great for teaching your children math. So much fun, highly interactive and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sproduct

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy for curious 2 year old who loves to play 5 little monkeys with it. However I am giving this a 4 star because its day 1 and i can see the paint on the little monkey chipping off already. Update: Bumping to 5 stars. Amazing customer service! They contacted me after reading the review to take care of the chipped monkeys.
customer_reviews.author: Neha

customer_reviews.title: Engaging
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! My 3, 5 and 7 year old daughters loved it. The only issue was we received 2 of the same number so have to return it
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Functional but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The idea is cute and educational, however I am worried about the quality. The plastic is flimsy, especially the yellow arms to the measuring plates, they look like they can easily snap. A toy I keep only for school and learning time
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Ours must be out of balance and I have no idea how to fix. Such a cool idea and I love the concept, but ours the balance will drop all the way to the floor and nothing can bring it back up without manual intervention. For us, it just doesn’t work. Now my son just puts all the monkeys in his PJ mask cars and takes them for a ride!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Box was missing the 30 Double Sided Cards
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you open the box and check for all pieces right away. I bought this for a Christmas present but I put gifts away and pull one out a month. We just opened it and the cards are missing from the box! Unfortunately, my return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my preschool son!
customer_reviews.text: This has been an awesome but! My preschool son loves to play with this and my goodness he impressed me. We can sit there for hours working out math and number problems! I gave a three On sturdiness because it does seem you have to be careful not to break it but it’s a scale so that’s expected.
customer_reviews.author: moome

customer_reviews.title: Very quick and easy to use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for little ones. Very quick and easy to use right out of the box. My grandson absolutely loves his, especially the monkey design since our nickname for him is Chunky Monkey. It's a great companion when working on his math assignments, as he uses it often.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fun and teaches at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my granddaughter who is 5 years old. Both her and her 10 year old brother are having fun playing it together. It was given as a “care package” for the new distance learning and shelter at home.
customer_reviews.author: NMiles

customer_reviews.title: Educational fun
customer_reviews.text: A fun game for our 3 year old. He can have fun while learning.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: My preschooler loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great beginning math concepts toy/game. My preschooler plays with this on her own at least once/week. Self-guided learning! I sit down with her to play with it to add on to what she’s doing and help her understand more math concepts. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Alaniz

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for your future mathematician. Great and fun way of getting your child to engage in learning numbers and counting. Arrived quickly. This item is too cute and is gift able.
customer_reviews.author: Tenacity Best

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my nephew and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lina Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Game as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I will update once it's been opened on Christmas. But the box arrived in excellent condition and looks exactly as the photos. Perfect quiet time, solo play for our 3.5 yo daughter.
customer_reviews.author: AH and MM

customer_reviews.title: This is adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is so cool! It enables my 4 yr old granddaughter to practice her numbers by counting the monkeys to match the number on the card. Very easy to play and the monkeys are cute. This is a great way to spend time playing with our kids!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wolf

customer_reviews.title: My 4 and 6yo adore this game.
customer_reviews.text: I got this game for my 4 year old who is interested in learning her numbers better. I also wanted this to be helpful for my dyslexic 6yo. It's been working great and they have loads of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolingmamaof4

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun way to play and learn numbers at the same time! My three year old is getting a kick out of how many monkeys it takes to balance each number! My ten year old also is getting use out of it and likes to play! Definitely would reccomend and would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Entze

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Game
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren LOVE this game! And their parents were thrilled that it was a learning game. They are both teachers and very impressed with it. So glad I bought this as a quarantine activity for them!
customer_reviews.author: Donetta

customer_reviews.title: Best classroom scale!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome educational addition to my preschool classroom! Great quality. It comes with the scale, monkey figurines, cards and weighted numbers. The numbers weight matches the corresponding amount of monkies! This item has been a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: JennyRuth

customer_reviews.title: Great for learning to count
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old loves playing with the monkeys, and it has definitely helped introduce the idea of counting and number recognition. Can't wait to continue using this for learning basic addition and subtraction!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Merlan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Son likes this toy a lot, fun way to learn numbers
customer_reviews.author: chicagogal

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson to help him learn numbers and count them out. Turns out that my 5 year old loves to play it with him. He pretends he is the teacher and helps him. Such a fun and cute little game.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sanangelo

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves this STEM toy.
customer_reviews.text: I gave my grandson this STEM toys for Christmas; he is a high functioning autistic four-year old child, and he is obsessed with numbers. He loves and plays a lot with his toy.
customer_reviews.author: ecat1245

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this. He is going into kindergarten this fall and this is a great learning tool. He has so much fun playing with it and learning at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: 3 year old granddaughter is learning a lot with this
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Bleeker

customer_reviews.title: Good for lessons, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent learning tool for toddlers and preschoolers. Both my 3yo and 5yo play with it. They are learning counting, colors, and a little science with the balance. The plastic is cheap and brittle. The paint was already chipped in the box. Overall, it’s a great learning toy and will likely last through our purpose with it before being sent off in the recycle bin.
customer_reviews.author: valeriewalls

customer_reviews.title: Awesome educational toy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toy that teaches kids addition in a really fun way. My 4yo and 2yo grandkids love it! They are so proud when they get it right.
customer_reviews.author: sandy boetsma

customer_reviews.title: Balance monkey
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year olds love this! Fun and great visual. I also teach kindergarten, so, this is an easier way to teach numbers and correspondence
customer_reviews.author: Ilyssa Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a birthday gift for my 3-yr-old grandson, and both he and his 6-yr-old brother were enjoying it (at least on days 1 and 2). It's a good intro to numbers for the little one, and the older boy is honing his addition and subtraction skills with it. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ns319

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a really fun game which my toddler likes.you need spend some time with the cards.fun way to learn math
customer_reviews.author: Sivakumar

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but missing so many pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it more stars but unfortunately I am missing so many pieces that my kids can't even play it. I tried to contact the company but they would not work with me and send the missing pieces. BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grand daughter. She just turned 4. She has been having fun with it. Helping her become familiar with math.
customer_reviews.author: Kateebee

customer_reviews.title: Special needs approved
customer_reviews.text: I have a special needs little boy whom I homeschool and let me tell you this has avioded alot of melt downs,he would much rather do math time do this rather than anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves this toy. It has helped us make counting fun! we add the numbers together and have him do simple addition as well. Its a great toy to teach counting and math. The counting monkeys are small so not good for small babies.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!!! My kinders are going to love this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great to grow into!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is learning his numbers and counting, so this is a good start. He'll use it for adding also, later. It's a cute learning tool, and he loves the monkeys and scale.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift to my sons preschool classroom at Christmas, very cute and durable. The teachers were shocked and are finding curriculum uses for it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift. It came without the base on which the monkey is to stand, making the entire product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to teach math
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the coolest way to teach kids math. What a great visual to show numbers and then move on to adding. Teaching my 4 year old numbers, and my 6 year old adding and subtracting with the same game. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: I

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Though my three year old is still learning the concept, I think it’s a good and interesting design project.
customer_reviews.author: goodol

customer_reviews.title: Good Math Toy
customer_reviews.text: My three year son has enjoyed this math game. It is effective with number recognition, counting, adding, and subtracting. Keeps him busy and learning!
customer_reviews.author: altagracia baez

customer_reviews.title: My grandsons loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I hear from my daughter that the Monkey Balance will hold the boy's interest longer than most learning toys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Piece of garbage arrived missing the two blue plates that are supposed to accompany the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Veejay M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and learning!
customer_reviews.text: It is fun and my grandson doesn’t even know that he is learning while having fun. He’s very engaged with the activity!
customer_reviews.author: marie carrasco

product_meta.title: CoolToys Monkey Balance Cool Math Game for Girls & Boys | Fun, Educational Children's Gift & Kids Toy STEM Learning Ages 5+ (64-Piece Set)
feature_bullets: COOL MATH GAME: This game teaches basic counting and beginning math skills and encourages retention through stimulating multi-level math games.

INTERACTIVE LEARNING: Monkey Balance is perfect for children ages 3 and up and is the ideal teaching tool for parents, families, and teachers looking to encourage and reinforce multi-dimensional learning at home, school, nursery, and during tutoring sessions.

EASY SET-UP + INSTRUCTIONS: Monkey Balance has everything kids and families need to start playing and having hours of math and counting fun! This STEM game is easy to assemble and easy to learn—so children and families can start playing instantly.
KID + FAMILY FUN: This 65-piece toy set includes: 19 monkeys, numbers 1–10, 30 double-sided cards, monkey scale, base, 2 scale pans and an easy-to-read instruction leaflet.

ENGAGING + EDUCATIONAL PLAY: Get toddlers and young kids on the counting and mathematics fast track! Monkey Balance improves memory, encourages interactive play and helps develop fine motor skills. Cute graphics and colorful design are eye-catching for the whole family! Monkey Balance also makes a great gift for young girls, boys and families!
